All_x0020_Cards.Card_x0020_Text: Rage 2 When this deals damage to a champion, draw a card.
All_x0020_Cards.Flavor_x0020_Text: Their defiled omens will make you squeal.

All_x0020_Cards.Card_x0020_Text: [1 SHOT]: Deploy - Summon a copy of this. When this deals damage to a champion, draw a card.
All_x0020_Cards.Flavor_x0020_Text: Their gleaming reflection will foretell your doom.

All_x0020_Cards.Card_x0020_Text: Flight When this deals damage to a champion, draw a card.
All_x0020_Cards.Flavor_x0020_Text: Their defiled omens will bring death from above.

All_x0020_Cards.Card_x0020_Text: Put target non-prismatic troop into your deck.
All_x0020_Cards.Flavor_x0020_Text: Even the mightiest predators fell to the Enders' wrath.
